sneakers.name: DUNK HI RETRO BTTYS 'STADIUM GREEN/WHITE-STADIUM GREEN-WHITE'
sneakers.description: Recognizing the Dunk's roots as the top-ranking college team sneaker, the Be True To Your School pack looks to the original ad campaign for inspiration. Colors represent top-flight universities, while design details serve throwback hoops flair. And that crisp leather has the perfect amount of sheen to make 'em a hands-down win. So lace up and show off that varsity spirit with color combos that nod to your fave team. Ya game?

sneakers.name: MN SKATE SK8-HI 'BLUE'
sneakers.description: This season, we are proud to introduce a run-on sentence collaboration of some of the most creative legends in skateboarding: The Vans x Krooked Featuring Art By Natas For Ray Barbee collection. Yeah, read that again. Vans teamed up with Krooked Skateboards and got Natas Kaupas to do the art to celebrate Ray Barbee. How is this possible? We could say something cool like Even the gum rubber sole that made Vans famous has been elevated with the SICKSTICK™ rubber compound to deliver more grip and boardfeel. Plus, POPCUSH™ energy return sockliners provide superior cushioning and impact protection while helping to lessen leg fatigue for longer skate sessions. Internal heel stiffeners have also been added to provide more support and stability.

sneakers.name: OLD SKOOL 36 DX 'LEATHER CHECK/MULTI/RED'
sneakers.description: The Anaheim Factory Old Skool 36 DX pays tribute to our first Vans factory in Anaheim, California, by borrowing details from the original Old Skool and offering modernized comfort with upgraded OrtholiteÂ® sockliners. This iconic sidestripe shoe also includes throwback details like the original style number and color palette or reissued prints, higher glossed foxing tape, cotton laces, original drill lining weight, and sturdy leather uppers to complete the look.

sneakers.name: 2002R 'NAVY'
sneakers.description: The New Balance 2002R reintroduces a technical running favorite from the 2000s, outfitting the original design with modern performance upgrades. A synthetic upper construction is rendered with sleek curves and cutout segments for an updated take on a classic look. The performance of a Stability Web and N-ergy shock absorbing outsole stacked on an ABZORB midsole offer comfort and performance that can’t be pinned down with a date

sneakers.name: TERMINATOR HIGH 'WHITE/GAME ROYAL'
sneakers.description: Untouched, unaltered and straight from the vault, the Terminator High lets you step back to the era of hook shots, knee pads and calf-high socks. Returning to the '85 original (Nike's first-ever signature school shoe), the throwback look stays easy-to-style with vibrant blue accents against crisp white. Premium leather keeps your look smoother than backboard glass and retro branding delivers a big varsity finish. It's game time!

sneakers.name: 327 'ORANGE'
sneakers.description: As recreational running established widespread popularity in the 1970s, the benchmark for running footwear shifted from mere existence to performance. While the era’s designs would be considered simple by today’s standards, the decade stands out as the moment when running shoes truly came into their own. The 327 sheds new light on the ‘70s as a time of innovation by boldly reshaping classic design elements with a thoroughly contemporary outlook. With an angular reworking of the tried-and-true wedge silhouette, outsize, asymmetrically applied ‘N’ branding, and wraparound, trail-inspired lug outsole, the 327 provides nothing less than a complete reimagination of our running heritage.

sneakers.name: W BLAZER LOW '77 JUMBO 'SUMMIT WHITE/GEODE TEAL-SEA GLASS'
sneakers.description: They say, Don't fix what works. We say, Perfect it. This streetwear superstar gets revamped with jumbo-sized details. Harnessing the old-school look you love, the Nike Blazer Low '77 Jumbo features an oversized Swoosh design, extra-wide laces and thicker stitching.

sneakers.name: 997H 'LIGHT ALUMINUM'
sneakers.description: We’ve reimagined a popular heritage model in the 997H with a combination of classic style and innovation for a look that stands out. The sleek everyday men's sneaker pops with an elevated suede and mesh upper in fresh seasonal colors. Wherever you go, your feet will find comfort in the lightweight ENCAP Reveal midsole cushioning.

sneakers.name: QUESTION MID CHALK/CORE BLACK/VECTOR BLUE
sneakers.description: ALLEN IVERSON SIGNATURE SHOES THAT NOD TO HIS JOURNEY Allen Iverson's fierce attitude proved the critics and pundits wrong time and time again. These men's signature shoes are synonymous with his unapologetic style of play. Details like the contrast-colour toe, Reebok-lettered eyelets and crystal rubber outsole make these a true B-ball classic. Hexalite cushions on impact, so you can keep that pep in your step.

sneakers.name: X SNEEZE MAG CLUB C GROUNDS 'EARTH/STUCCO/FTWR WHITE'
sneakers.description: SNEEZE Magazine is an authentic guide to modern street culture based on skateboarding and other subcultures. Its unpretentious vibes reflect in this collaboration with Reebok.

sneakers.name: WMNS AIR JORDAN 1 LOW SPORT BLUE/GYM RED-WHITE-SAIL
sneakers.description: Always in, always fresh. The Air Jordan 1 Low sets you up with a piece of Jordan history and heritage that's comfortable all day. Choose your colors, then step out in the iconic profile that's built with a high-end mix of materials and encapsulated Air in the heel.

sneakers.name: BLAZER MID '77 JUMBO 'WHITE/MANTRA ORANGE-SAIL-TOTAL ORANGE'
sneakers.description: Always in, always fresh. The Air Jordan 1 Low sets you up with a piece of Jordan history and heritage that's comfortable all day. Choose your colors, then step out in the iconic profile that's built with a high-end mix of materials and encapsulated Air in the heel.

sneakers.name: X FENTY CREEPER PHATTY 'BLACK-WARM WHITE-GUM'
sneakers.description: This FENTY x PUMA Creeper Phatty is wrapped in suede, with a padded and debossed Formstrip, debossed FENTY logos, gold aglets, and a stacked crepe gum sole.

sneakers.name: SAMBA OG 'CORE WHITE/HALO BLUE/GUM'
sneakers.description: VINTAGE SNEAKERS INSPIRED BY UNLIMITED EUROPEAN TRAIN TRAVEL. The adidas Samba shoes have been part of the 3-Stripes DNA for decades. The classic silhouette has jumped the fence on the soccer pitch to influence countless subcultures and fashion forerunners. This pair celebrates a period in the '70s when a unique month-long rail pass program let adventurers from around the world explore 21 European countries. These comfortable classics help you greet your own next adventure in style.

sneakers.name: TERMINATOR LOW PREMIUM 'PHANTOM/BLACK-COCONUT MILK-DESERT OCHRE'
sneakers.description: The Terminator Low Premium lets you step back to the era of hook shots, knee pads and calf-high socks. Crisp leather keeps your look smoother than backboard glass while retro branding delivers a big varsity finish. It's game time!

sneakers.name: AIR JORDAN 5 RETRO SE 'MIDNIGHT NAVY/BLACK-FOOTBALL GREY'
sneakers.description: A new AJ5 is a win, no matter how you look at it. This one is made of leather and textiles, with a special finish for a textured look. And that Nike Air in the sole is sure to keep you comfy with every step.

sneakers.name: BAD BUNNY RESPONSE CL 'ECRU TINT/BRONZE STRATA/EARTH STRATA'
sneakers.description: The Adidas Response CL arrives revealing more layers and invites us to move like Benito, with the Paso Fino, that unique, elegant, and confident walk, towards the unknown, because it is there that we can discover what no one ever saw. Introducing a sophisticated color palette of brown and purple, this colorway reflects the arid colors of the desert, merged with the textures and lines of the mountains. The concept, set in the western universe, summons us to see beyond, choose a path and trust in our vision. The new Response CL features various tints of tan and brown, with accenting pops of purple. Mesh underlays.

sneakers.name: BLACKTOP RIDER WASHED 'ASTRO RED-TEAM REGAL RED'
sneakers.description: Meet the newest member of the PUMA Rider family. The Blktop Rider features a rubber outsole inspired by PUMA's track and field archive from the '80s. Heritage colours and materials meet modern design elements in this new classic silhouette. This version features a mesh base with suede overlays, while embossed details and a washed finish complete the shoe.

sneakers.name: AIR JORDAN 11 RETRO 'SAIL/VELVET BROWN-ATMOSPHERE'
sneakers.description: Let's cut to the chase—the AJ11 is all-time. MJ won 72 games and a title while wearing 'em. Now, the icon returns with velvet detailing and a near-monochromatic colorway. From the slick accents (check out that Jumpman) to its color-matched outsole, this Tinker Hatfield design brings the off-court allure. And for the final touch? Full-length Air cushioning is the cherry on top (er, bottom).

sneakers.name: AIR JORDAN 11 RETRO 'SAIL/VELVET BROWN-ATMOSPHERE'
sneakers.description: This fall, the premium Chuck 70 gets a dash of craft. A mix of heavyweight canvas and woven jacquard bring a patchwork look to these classic Chucks. From the art studio, to wherever you feel most cozy, this look is easy to wear all-year long.
